document_data.name: The Nine Swords
document_data.mainbody: '''The Nine Swords''', also known as the '''Inn of the Nine Swords''' was a high-quality inn found in the [[village]] of [[Swords Pool (village)|Swords Pool]] in [[the Vast]]. It stood on the western side of the road, between the [[North Road]] and the pond of [[Swords Pool (pool)|Swords Pool]].
document_data.History:
The inn was named for the nine [[sword]]s of the [[Nine Swords Company]]. These were hidden in Swords Pool, the body of water that gave its name to the village.{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Crusaders, Swordsages, Warblades|}}

In the mid-1370s [[DR]], several young [[blade magic]]ians of the Vast re-founded the Nine Swords Company. They used the Inn of the Nine Swords.
document_data.Owners: The Nine Swords inn was owned by the three Mellicot sisters: [[Melicent Mellicot|Melicent]], [[Meliors Mellicot|Meliors]], and [[Melusine Mellicot|Melusine]].
